name: Band of Brothers (itch)
description:
A simple mercenary simulator which I made for LD44.

You control a band of mercenaries looking for gold. Manage your resources and tactics. Pick your missions correct and one day you can be the Mercenary King.

Uses some procedural generation.(not much though)

Graphics and Programming are mine.
I used the loop from  Random Mind - Medieval: Minstrel Dance for the music. 

For sound effects I used 8-bit effects from LittleRobotSoundFactory attribution licenced free sounds.
